line.comment: * how well is this faction doing with all ship crafting resources? 0 = starving, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high
* also optimizes the economy in a second step
* our resources can build more valuable stuff if we have a production specialization discount (first multiplied by 100 to workaround integer missing decimal digit)

line.text: ' in their Outposts. It is worth '
' to a true production cost value of '

line.comment: * our combined resource status can only be as good as our lowest ship part reserve
* should the AI optimize its ship part economy?
**^^^ this is slightly outdated from the previous AI cycle (but its fine)
